titles.title: To designate a portion of the Nantahala National Forest in Jackson County, North Carolina, in honor of James and Elspeth McClure Clarke.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 12/17/2001--Introduced. Designates the Panthertown Valley tract of the Nantahala National Forest in Jackson County, North Carolina, as the James and Elspeth McClure Clark Forest.
